exercises.name: Wall Sits
exercises.notes: Hold a steady wall sit for 45 seconds while keeping your knees aligned over your feet.

exercises.name: Terminal Knee Extension
exercises.notes: Extend your knee into terminal extension, hold for 3 seconds, then return with control.

exercises.name: Split Squats
exercises.notes: Lower under control, keep your torso upright, and drive through the front foot.

exercises.name: Step Ups (8in)
exercises.notes: Use an 8-inch step and avoid pushing off the trailing leg.

exercises.name: Controlled Step Downs (6in)
exercises.notes: Use a 6-inch step with a 4-second lower and pause before returning.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Sit-to-Stand (High Chair)
exercises.notes: Use a high chair and control both the stand and the descent.
